short_summary: To estimate the cost of implementing next-generation ERP systems across all departments and agencies, a cost model is being developed. Also, to approximate the implementation cost for each department or agency.

full_summary:
**Financial Specialist Solicitation**
==============================
### Procurement Number
`23-132`

### Solicitation Type
Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Description
The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat (TBS) is seeking a Financial Specialist to support the development and sustainment of enterprise resource planning (ERP) systems across the public service. The Consultant will be responsible for analyzing the development and implementation costs of existing and anticipated ERP systems, including financial management, procurement, asset and inventory management, and other corporate functions.

### Amendment
Amendment #2 was issued to modify the solicitation closing time. Amendment #1 extended the solicitation period.

### Contract Period
The period of the resulting contract will be for one (1) year with the option to extend for two additional one-year periods.

### Key Responsibilities
* Develop a cost model to estimate the enterprise cost of the financial management transformation and implementation costs for each department or agency.
* Populate a template with relevant inputs in support of the cost model's development.
* Provide analysis and recommendations to TBS on the development and implementation costs of ERP systems.

### Contact Information
* Gonga, Brigitte: `Brigitte.Gonga@tbs-sct.gc.ca`
* Phone: 613-218-6635

### Tender Documents
Tender documents, including the full solicitation text and bid form, are available on the Canadabuyss website:

* English version: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/24/c41551d681fc67e3481dca9b6931009f/23-132-_npp_english_version.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/24/c41551d681fc67e3481dca9b6931009f/23-132-_npp_english_version.pdf)
* French version: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/21/4b3a391f167a3dada679cd839396d209/23-132_npp_french_version_amd_1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/21/4b3a391f167a3dada679cd839396d209/23-132_npp_french_version_amd_1.pdf)
